title: From false dawn to lost year: How Ferrari is facing winless F1 2025
summary: What began as a year of hope with Hamilton's arrival has turned into Ferrari's bleakest season in years and with the prospect of finishing it without a win

qa_pairs.question: Which driver joined Ferrari in 2025, initially bringing hope to the team?
What is the primary concern for Ferrari regarding the F1 2025 season?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: Finishing the season without a win
wrong_options: Having the fastest car on the grid

qa_pairs.question: In which year did Ferrari face the prospect of a winless season after initial optimism?
